solution.text:
The figure consists of a polygon with 6 sides, hence the sum of its interior angles is \( (6-2) \times 180 = 4 \times 180 = 720^o\)
x+y+k+120+150+90 = 720
But the value of k is _{k}_
x+y + (360+_{k}_) = 720
x+y = 720 - (_{{360+k}}_) = \(_{{360-k}}_^o\)

content.text: Find the value of x + y in the figure below where _{k}_ is k
